issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: This was added relatively recently. Many/most kernels use helpers like TemporalTypes() to define their type support, we should add the MonthDayNano type there and see what needs fixing (and add tests). We also need to update googletest testing::Types definitions to include the new type.
fields.summary: [C++] Include month-day-nano intervals in kernel type support
